summary:
Paris: ☀️ Avg 26.9°C (0°C range), 0% rain (0% range)
High 32°C / Low 22°C
gpt_comment: With an agreeable average of 26.9°C and high of 32°C, Paris is set to enjoy a sunny day with no expected rainfall. Meteoblue also confirms these temperatures, though in Fahrenheit, predicting a high of 85°F (approx 29.4°C) and a low of 66°F (approx 18.9°C). Perfect weather for those who enjoy basking in the sun, perhaps it's a day to see the city from a different perspective, like our simian friends at the zoo!
